title: Multicategory Classification by Support Vector Machines

The kernel function for the piecewise-nonlinear M-SVM and k-SVM methods is K(x, x i ) = x·x i n + 1 # d , where d is the degree of the desired polynomial. wine Recognition Data The Wine dataset [1] uses the chemical analysis of wine to determine the cultivar.
